name: Comfort Suites Miami Airport North

reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Comfort Suites Miami Airport North for one night before taking a flight the next day at the Miami International Airport. I was pleased with my selection of this hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel Facility - Questionable Charges!

reviews.text: The hotel is almost brand new, well designed, spacious, contemporary, clean, comfortable and affordably priced ($79.00 on 5/31/2012).
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms but some issues

reviews.text: My room consisted of a seperate sleeping and sitting area. There was a very nice TV in the room and there was a microwave and refrigerator that I did use.
reviews.title: Will come again!!

reviews.text: In the morning a breakfast was served which included a few hot items like biscuits and gravy as well as an assortment of baked goods. There was cereal and do-it-yourself waffles. They also had yogurt and fruit.
reviews.title: Can I give it 6 dots? One of the best hotels ever!

reviews.text: I took the shuttle to the airport which was just a few minutes away. If you have to catch a flight at a certain time, verify the when the shuttle leaves the airport from the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, they NEED more parking

reviews.text: We stayed here the night before our flight. It's very convenient to the Miami airport. The room and lobby were super clean and modern. The bed was very comfy and the bathroom was spotless. Will definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Super Clean and Comfortable!
Great/Comfortable/Well-Priced Stay
reviews.text: Hotel reportedly opened in Dec, 2011. Looked brand new. Stayed here one night enroute home from Peru. While we missed the first hotel shuttle from the airport, didn't wait too long for the next one for a quick trip to the hotel. Quick check in using AAA reservation for $89 plus tax for one king bed. Bed was very comfortable. Room was very quiet; no airplane/outside noise. Room had a sitting area with a sofa, coffee table, mini-fridge and tv also viewable from the bed. Large, clean bathroom. Super,filling breakfast. Shuttles to airport available every hour, on the hour.

reviews.title: Newly Built Hotel
reviews.text: No complaints. Highly recommend.

We stayed here pre cruise in late April and had our needs met at a good value when considering breakfast and the complimentary shuttles. Our flight arrived after 10:00 p.m. and we called to request a shuttle. Our driver was at the curb almost before we were. Our check-in took a few minutes because the desk clerk was obviously answering questions about booking a guest on the phone. We were able to make arrangements for an 11:00 a.m.shuttle to the port-although our family of four filled the last few spots on the list. Our room was graciously sized and clean. Everything was fresh and in well working order. My son says the couch sleeps great also. We were on the top floor and on a corner. The airport noise was dying down by this point of night and did not bother us. The planes began flying again fairly early, but that is to be expected. Breakfast was typical. The area was clean and well serviced. I did find the safe charge unusual from other hotels. Upon check-out, I mentioned this to the clerk and he asked if we had used it. I told him I had never even seen it. He did remove the charge. Our shuttle to the port was on time and met our needs well. The hotel has several amenities that we would have used has time allowed. My teen son spotted the military store from our window and we spent a few minutes there before catching the shuttle. Our stay exceeded our expectations for this trip. Thanks!
reviews.title: New Construction Hotel

reviews.text: The shuttle bus was clean and ran once an hour. The driver recommended a few realitively close restaurants. Our room was a two queen suite with luxurious bedding. The granite bath was very upscale.
reviews.title: Not a Good Choice if Needing a Restful Night's Sleep

reviews.text: ​Absolutely outstanding Comfort Suites. Brand new, free breakfast, lots of restaurants within walking distance. Very, very clean and modern. Make SURE you book the Comfort Suites on Minola Dr. -- NOT the Comfort Inns and Suites further to the West.
reviews.title: Wow! Great job Comfort Suites - beautiful hotel! Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large suites, great shower, comfortable bed, huge television, wifi, gym... I'm blown away at this hotel for the price (~ $70)
reviews.title: Had the Best Vacation Ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Great Pre Cruise Hotel

reviews.text: Loved this Hotel because of the staff and clean comfortable room, the breakfast which was wonderful every morning, the desk clerk, explained the Everglades to us while helping us by printing out directions from map quest each and every time we wanted to go anywhere, everyone was kind and helpful to us, we had the best vacation ever, saw and ate at places we would have never known about thanks to Dennis the man overseeing this Hotel, we will most deffinitly stay here the next time we visit Miami, God-Bless all who work here, made two old people from Colo very Happy
reviews.title: Nice new hotel, with few minor issue...

reviews.text: Arrived in the evening prior to our cruise out of the port of Miami. Clean comfortable rooms, free continental breakfast, and free transportation to the port. Perfect for our needs. Not much around the hotel in the way of restaurants etc. A good pre-cruise hotel.

aka: Comfort Suites Miami Airport North Hotel Miami Springs
description: Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, Comfort Suites Miami Airport North gives you plenty of space to relax and regroup. A premier option among Miami suite hotels, the brand new Comfort Suites® Miami Airport North is just 5 minutes from Miami International Airport and offers free transportation to both the airport and the Port of Miami.
